metadata.title: CVE-2019-16378 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenDMARC through 1.3.2 and 1.4.x through 1.4.0-Beta1 is prone to asignature-bypass vulnerability with multiple From: addresses, which mightaffect applications that consider a domain name to be relevant to theorigin of an e-mail message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16378` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopendmarc2 - 1.3.2-3ubuntu0.1
opendmarc - 1.3.2-3ubuntu0.1
rddmarc - 1.3.2-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opendmarc package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-3ubuntu0.1').
